texts.content-welcome-text: On veggiekarte.de you can find all vegan and vegetarian restaurants, ice cream parlors, cafés etc. registered in OpenStreetMap. Simply use the search field to search for your area or your street. All icons with a green background are venues with vegan options, while icons with a white background offer vegetarian but not vegan options.
texts.content-osm-text: OpenStreetMap is a free world map and works similarly to Wikipedia. Everyone can participate and enter information. This means that the map is full of useful information and updates continuously. Anyone who has suggestions for improvement or finds errors in the map can simply enter or fix data.
texts.content-contribute-text: If you yourself know restaurants, cafes, ice cream parlors or food kiosks that are not yet on the map, or run one yourself, then you can simply add them yourself. To do this, you have to mark the venue in OpenStreetMap with the 'diet:vegan' or 'diet:vegetarian' tag ("Diet Types"). Instructions are available here.
texts.content-reviews-text: lib.reviews is a free and open platform for reviewing anything. If there is a review of a place there, we will show a link to it.
texts.content-further-text: Veggiekarte is updated automatically every hour. You can find the code on Codeberg. And as a little gimmick we also have a little diagram here.
texts.i18n_vegan_only_title: Place which offers exclusively vegan food.
texts.i18n_vegetarian_only_title: Place which offers exclusively vegetarian and vegan food.
texts.i18n_vegan_friendly_title: Place which offers also vegan food.
texts.i18n_vegan_limited_title: Place with limited vegan offer (often you have to ask for it outside the menu).
texts.i18n_vegetarian_friendly_title: Place which offers also vegetarian food, but no vegan.
